thread.title: Dynex Capital, Inc. Announces Schedule for Fourth Quarter 2017 Results

author: cnbc.com
title: Dynex Capital, Inc. Announces Schedule for Fourth Quarter 2017 Results
text:
GLEN ALLEN, Va.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Dynex Capital, Inc. (NYSE: DX) announced today that it plans to release its fourth quarter 2017 results and hold the related conference call on Wednesday, February 21, 2018. The earnings press release will be issued by 8:00 a.m. ET and management will host the conference call to discuss the results at 10:00 a.m. ET.
Webcast Details
The press release, webcast, and accompanying presentation will be accessible online at www.dynexcapital.com under “Investor Center”. A replay will be available on the web site shortly after the call and available for 90-days.
Live Dial-in Information
Those wishing to listen to the live conference call via telephone should dial-in at least 10 minutes before the call begins at the following telephone numbers:
United States: (866) 393-4306
International: (734) 385-2616
Conference ID: 7279346
Web PIN: 2068
About Dynex Capital, Inc.
Dynex Capital, Inc. is an internally managed real estate investment trust, or REIT, which invests in mortgage assets on a leveraged basis. The Company invests in Agency and non-Agency RMBS, CMBS, and CMBS IO. Additional information about Dynex Capital, Inc. is available at www.dynexcapital.com .
View source version on businesswire.com : http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180206006105/en/
Dynex Capital, Inc.
Alison Griffin, 804-217-5897
Source: Dynex Capital, Inc.
